content: This is a reminder that we have an IPS/IPA call scheduled today beginning at 10:30 AM ET (14:30 UTC). The plan is to have the IPA portion for the first 30-45 min. and then we'll move to the IPS topics.
outcomes?

We reviewed the results from the IPA Project Proposal and created and submitted the PSS and talked about next steps, and then listed some items we plan to further discuss on the next IPA meeting in 2 weeks (not having the IPA part next week - but will go ahead with IPS).
link to the combined meeting minutes - the recording links and the IPS discussion are still to be filled in
Are we having a call today? @Rob Hausam @Isaac Vetter
Ah right, the Connectathon. Nevermind, talk to you next week. :)
However, are we having a call today?
@Rob Hausam @Isaac Vetter @Brett Marquard ?
This week it's the WGM? https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/207835-IPS/topic/IPS.20meeting.20in.20Patient.20Care.20Q4.20tomorrow.20.28Wednesday.29/near/254287353

Hey guys, I'm unable to make our regularly scheduled call tomorrow and next week. We need to continue making progress researching and documenting the country-specific international, patient access specifications. @Rob Hausam - would it make sense to cancel?
I plan to join the call an I would be happy to help facilitate the discussion, take notes, etc.

I'm willing to launch the meeting and assist @Vassil Peytchev, as well. So it sounds like maybe we should keep the meeting for this week and then decide what we think about next week?
@Isaac Vetter
:heart: You're awesome! Apologies for the late notice.
(I also have to miss today, sorry!)
Sorry, is there a call on now? I don't see it in the HL7 call calendar.
I am sorry I didn't see this earlier - the call information is at https://confluence.hl7.org/display/PC/IPA+Project+Group+Meetings
Is there a reason it isn't in the calendar?
posted open question on implementer support for Patient/$everything here: https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179166-implementers/topic/Who.20has.20implemented.20Patient.2F.24everything.20.3F
Is there a call today?
I am waiting as well. Should we look for an alternate conference option?
Google Meet or Teams? I can host either.
